title: GUI (Qt) Developer for embedded Linux (m/f) - MED-EL Medical Electronics
subtitle: Innsbruck, T 6020
body:
MED-EL is a leading manufacturer of innovative medical devices for the treatment of various types and degrees of hearing loss. Our unique portfolio of implantable hearing solutions benefits thousands of individuals in more than 100 countries worldwide. With headquarters in Innsbruck, Austria, MED-EL has over 2200 employees around the world. In support of our Business Unit Neurorehabilitation we are looking for an additional resource with focus on:
Apply online

GUI (Qt) Developer for embedded Linux (m/f)

STI_1_1803
Innsbruck, Austria

Main Tasks

  • Design and development of GUI components
  • Development of the interface between GUI and application layer
  • Verification and validation of the build components
  • Documentation according to the quality management system

Requirements

  • University/FH degree in the field of software engineering
  • Experience in programming with Qt, C/C++ and embedded Linux
  • Independent, systematic and structured approach
  • Team player and motivated to work independently
  • Very good communication skills, fluent in written and spoken English



Salary will be determined based on professional experience; the formal minimum salary according to Collective Bargaining Agreement is EUR 37,022.44.

We offer a challenging opportunity in a multinational work environment with English as our company language. Please visit our homepage at www.stiwell.com. We look forward to receiving your application online at jobs.medel.com



Apply online

MED-EL Medical Electronics

Headquarters
Fürstenweg 77a
